Text:
im not trying to sound picky, but any more details on this upload?  

i already have a collection of met, so i dont want to dl if i already have the stuff.  

you have any idea when this is from?

yes, some more details are needed, such as whether those files are HQ or simply MQ.

I don't collect middle quality files; they're a waste of time. 

A list of the models and sets would also be greatly appreciated, especially on that big a collection to fill a cd.

It would make a small text file you could put in the comments.
